      • formattedDoubleToString

        public java.lang.String formattedDoubleToString(double x,
                                       int places)
        This method converts a double to a string to be printed on the LCD of the robot.
        Parameters:
        x - The number that needs to be changed to a string.
        places - The number of decimal places to be shown on the LCD.
        Returns:
        The formatted string is returned.
